name: VIP Residence
service: Project /2018/, Khan-Uul district High-grade residential building consisting of total of 8 block building with 10 floors and 156 individual units. We are working on this project, which received the “2018 Best Residential Building” award from the Ministry of Construction and Urban Development, as a general project manager.
title: VIP Residence

name: Artsat Apartment
service: Total of 270 individual flats on 10 floors in 9 block buildings. The full cast framing of the first 6 block buildings of this project were completed by LBH.

name: HIGH APARTMENT
service: Total of 208 flats on 16 floors of 2 blocks buildings that were built as twin towers. The project was comprehensive full cast construction and interior design works.
title: HIGH APART project /2016/, Bayanzurkh district

name: Shangri-La Center
service: 2014, 2015 – Shangri La hotel extension where we completed its core framing and installation works.
title: Shangri-La Center

name: Asem Villa
service: In 2015 – core frame erection, installation, interior design and other interior works have been completed at 12 housing units of ASEAM Village.
title: Asem Villa

name: Bella Vista
service: In 2012 and 2013 – interior design and other interior works have been completed at Bella Vista residential buildings.

name: Buddha Vista
service: LBH worked as a sub-contractor on the following projects. 2015 – framed structures, interior design and other interior works at Buddha Vista residential housing project.

name: Royal House Hotel
service: In 2014 – interior design and other interior works have been completed at Royal House hotel.
